resources.string: Pick three notification sounds to play with your SoundRemote!
SoundRemote is designed to be used with an Android Wear smartwatch.

SoundRemote is a simple app that play sounds on your phone using your Android Wear smartwatch. 

I first created this app to prank my cat with meowing sounds. I'm sure there are plenty of other creative uses. 

Have fun!

Version 0.1 - May 2017
 - First release of SoundRemote
 - Three sounds supported; one-way comms (watch to phone)
 
 Version 0.2 (next)
 - Sync sound names to watch


Thanks to Google for providing Android System Icons under CC-BY. Some icons were used, others modified, for the icons used in this app.
